headline: Jim Cramer Says He’s Been ‘Consistently Bullish on Kinder Morgan, Inc. (KMI)’
summary: We recently compiled a list of the Jim Cramer’s List of 7 Energy Stocks for the Trump Trade. In this article, we are going to take a look at where Kinder Morgan, Inc. (NYSE:KMI) stands against the other energy stocks. Jim Cramer, the host of Mad Money, recently shared his views on the future of the […]

headline: Kinder Morgan: Minimal Dividend Growth Is Likely During 2025
summary: I only expect minimal dividend growth for Kinder Morgan during 2025. Check out why I downgrade KMI stock from buy to hold.
